Meetings & Events

Group Gatherings and Celebrations
Our Event Venues 
From board meetings and executive retreats to intimate celebrations, HarbourView Inn offers an inviting venue for meetings and events of every kind. From complimentary WiFi in the guest rooms and meeting spaces to the recently-refreshed Flagship Meeting Room, find all the essential features to make your gathering in downtown Charleston a success.

1670 Room
ELEVATE YOUR OCCASION 
Rooted in Old World charm, 1670 Room is a transportive private venue designed for exclusive gatherings. Located steps away at the French Quarter Inn, its 1,105 square feet of handsomely appointed event space features palmetto-inspired art, French chandeliers, and a stately fireplace.

Conveniently located in downtown Charleston

Frequently Asked Questions

How many rooms are considered a "group" to receive a discounted group rate?

We offer a discounted group rate to groups of five or more rooms per night.

Is there a food and beverage minimum in the meeting rooms?

There is no minimum spend for food and beverage in meeting spaces.

Is there a restaurant on-site?

No, there is no restaurant at the inn itself. However, we are only a few short steps from some of the best restaurants in downtown Charleston.

Is there a spa on-site?

No, but we are only two blocks from Earthling Day Spa, one of the best spas in downtown Charleston. We can also arrange for certain spa treatments from the comfort of your guest room.

Does the meeting space have natural light?

It does not. Our meeting room is equipped with artificial lighting.

How large is the meeting space?

Our on-site meeting space is 546 square feet. For larger groups in need of more space, our sister hotel - French Quarter Inn - offers larger meeting rooms with abundant natural light, as well as a beautiful terrace. French Quarter Inn is just a couple of blocks away, within walking distance.

Does the HarbourView Inn do buyouts?

Yes, we are happy to offer buyouts of all 52 guest rooms!
